title: Business Problem
Architecture
content:
In the last meeting, we whiteboarded a solution for Martin based on an event-driven serverless architecture.
Principles Modern, event driven solution that lays the foundation for further development. The solution should require as little overhead as possible.
Well Architected Framework The goal was to design a solution specific to this use-case but also flexible enough to evolve over time. Additionally, the solution must follow all of the well architected framework pillars:
 Operational Excellence. The solution must do what it is supposed to do. Security. The solution should secure data at rest and transit. Only authorized people can see and interact with the data. Reliability. The solution must be fault tolerant and auto-scaling. Performance Efficiency. The solution must be fast. Cost Optimization. The solution’s value should far exceed the solution’s costs.  Diagrams High Level Architecture Presentation Layer Architecture

title: Cost and Timeline
content:
This is a cost estimate for implentation and ongoing costs for one Offshore facility. Costs are estimated in US dollars for the US-East-1 region. The estimates do not include fees, taxes, or Octank Enterprise Discounts. The actual costs depend on a variety of factors, including the project scope and actual usage of AWS services.

title: Extending the Concept
content:
The solution is the start of a journey. It is designed to be extendible without creating Technical Debt.
Specifically, it is designed to:
 Ingest additional data sources Support additional presentation layers Integrate current and future AI/ML models  Amazon Alexa An example of the extendibility would be adding a voice interface so that Martin could get updates and ask questions in real time.
